question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: Civic Center Way Improvements, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs, Marie Canyon Green Streets, Westward Beach Road Improvements, Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2, 2021 Annual Street Maintenance
evidence_answer: Civic Center Way Improvements, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs, Marie Canyon Green Streets, Westward Beach Road Improvements, Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2, 2021 Annual Street Maintenance.

2021 Annual Street Maintenance

(cid:190) Updates: This project included resurfacing Malibu Road, Broad Beach Road,

This project was identified in the City’s Pavement
